title.en: Danshi Koukousei de Urekko Light Novel Sakka o Shiteiru keredo, Toshishita no Classmate de Seiyuu no Onnanoko ni Kubi o Shimerareteiru - Pony (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: Pony (男子高校生で売れっ子ライトノベル作家をしているけれど、年下のクラスメイトで声優の女の子に首を絞められている)
(C86) Pony (男子高校生で売れっ子ライトノベル作家をしているけれど、年下のクラスメイトで声優の女の子に首を絞められている)

altTitles.ja-ro: Pony (Danshi Koukousei de Urekko Light Novel Sakka o Shiteiru keredo, Toshishita no Classmate de Seiyuu no Onnanoko ni Kubi o Shimerareteiru)

altTitles.en: Pony (I'm A High School Boy and a Successful Light Novel Author, But I'm Being Strangled By A Female Classmate Who's A Voice Actress And Is Younger Than Me)

description.en:
Doujin parody of Danshi Koukousei de Urekko Light Novel Sakka o Shiteiru keredo, Toshishita no Classmate de Seiyuu no Onnanoko ni Kubi o Shimerareteiru light novel.

Released on Comiket 86

biography.en:
**Native name**: 稲戸せれれ 

Member of the doujin circle [Hannama](https://mangadex.org/author/b575b3f9-c0b8-4bb3-be6b-af16a0e4d586) together with [Soine](https://mangadex.org/author/89804a3c-5606-42a7-a4a7-f70eb292ad30).

[Circle website](http://www.hannama.net/)
